    • Avatar

      public Avatar​(processing.core.PImage avatarImage, processing.core.PImage paintGunImage, int x, int y, int w, int h, java.awt.Color color)
      Parameters:
      x - x-coord of starting location of the Avatar
      y - y-coord of starting location of the Avatar
      w - width of Avatar
      h - height of Avatar
      color - red/blue for one of the two characters in the game
